T02bsu050_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśasāhasrapañcaśatairbodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma, lokapālādidevakoṭiniyutasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ
T02bsu050_u:6: atha khalu bodhisattvo mahāsattvo āryāvalokiteśvaro utthāya āsanādekamaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ
T02bsu050_u:9: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti ||
T02bsu050_u:10: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākaruṇikāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra, yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya pradhānāya ca dīrgharātraṃ niyuktaḥ |
T02bsu050_u:11: tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru |
T02bsu050_u:13: 'haṃ te prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ mahāpuṇyām, yasyāḥ śravaṇamātreṇa sarvasattvāḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇāni kṣapayiṣyanti, niyataṃ ca bodhiparāyaṇā
T02bsu050_u:15: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnenaḥ mantrāḥ sidhyanti ||
T02bsu050_u:16: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat
T02bsu050_u:17: - tena hi sugata bhāṣatu sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca ||
T02bsu050_u:18: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocano nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma, yasya ca samādhiṃ samāpannasya bhagavata ūrṇākośavivarāllavādanekāni raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma |
T02bsu050_u:20: ye ca sattvāstayā prabhayā spṛṣṭāḥ, te sarve niyatā abhūvannanuttarāya samyaksaṃbodhau |
T02bsu050_u:21: yāvannārakāḥ sattvāḥ * * *sarve ca buddhakṣetrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ praviceluḥ |
T02bsu050_u:23: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate sma |
T02bsu050_u:32: tadyathā - oṃ mune mune mahāmunaye svāhā || asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā lābhāt mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiranuprāptā |
T02bsu050_u:33: sarvabuddhāśca ato niryātāḥ || mayā api iyameva
T02bsu050_u:35: | tena hi tvaṃ sarvabodhisattvānāmagrato buddhatve ca vyākṛtaḥ -
T02bsu050_u:37: śrīkūṭarājā nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
T02bsu050_u:38: [badiyamapi?] ye idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhayayiṣyanti, parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti, pustakalikhitamapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti
T02bsu050_u:39: pūjayiṣyanti, te sarve alpopāyena alpaśravaṇena ca tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti |
T02bsu050_u:40: tadyathā - oṃ jeya jeya padmābhe avame avame sarasaraṇi dhiridhiri devatā
T02bsu050_u:41: anupālani yuddhottāriṇi paracakranivāriṇi pūraya pūraya bhagavati sarva āśā mama ca sarvasattvānāṃ ca |
T02bsu050_u:43: buddhādhiṣṭhite svāhā || iyaṃ sā kulaputra paramārthaprajñāpāramitā sarvabuddhānāṃ jananī bodhisattvamātā (bodhidātrī) pāpahārakā |
T02bsu050_u:44: sarvabuddhairapi na śaknoti asyānuśaṃsā vaktuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭiśatairapi |
T02bsu050_u:45: anayā paṭhitamātreṇa sarvaparṣanmaṇḍalābhiṣiktā bhavanti, sarve ca mantrāḥ
T02bsu050_u:47: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kena kāraṇena bhagavan iyaṃ svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha -
T02bsu050_u:49: ye 'pi sattvā mandāsvādāḥ, te 'pi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhayiṣyanti, te sarve alpopāyena bodhiparāyaṇā bhaviṣyanti |
T02bsu050_u:50: anena kāraṇena kulaputra iyaṃ saṃkṣiptā svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā ||
T02bsu050_u:52: āścaryaṃ bhagavan, paramāścaryaṃ sugata, yāvadeva bhagavān sarvasattvahitāya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣito mandapudgalānāmeva arthāya
T02bsu050_u:56: te ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti ||
